definition: white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera
snow/snowfall/CL:場|场[chang2]/to have the appearance of snow/to wipe away, off or out/to clean

public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)
owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)

sentences.english: Snow white tried in vain to please her step-mother.
sentences.chinese: 白雪公主嘗試取悅後母是徒勞的。

sentences.english: They see Cinderella and Snow White.
sentences.chinese: 她們會看到灰姑娘和白雪公主。

sentences.english: Then the Queen know that Snow-white was dead.
sentences.chinese: 於是，王后知道白雪公主已經死了。

sentences.english: What?S. W is nat dead?Hahaha, I got a good idea.
sentences.chinese: 什麼？白雪公主沒死？哈哈哈，我又有一個好主意。

sentences.english: When she saw her, she knew that the bride was Snow White.
sentences.chinese: 皇后看到新娘時，她便知道那是白雪公主。

sentences.english: Because she is so nice, they soon like her.
sentences.chinese: 不外白雪公主人很好，所以他們很快就喜歡她了。

sentences.english: Snow White ate the bad apple.
Wooo, snow white! You can speak English?
sentences.chinese: 挖，小白雪公主，你會英文？

sentences.english: Years went by. Snow-white grew up and became a little girl.
sentences.chinese: 幾年了，白雪公主長成了小姑娘。

sentences.english: The witch took the necessary hair of Snow White while she was sleeping.
sentences.chinese: 巫婆在她睡著時取了一根白雪公主的頭髮。

sentences.english: But the old woman laced her up so tightly that Snow White could not breathe.
sentences.chinese: 但這老婦把結打得太緊了，以致於白雪公主無法呼吸。

sentences.english: Each one is a pure Jasmine beautiful Snow White.
sentences.chinese: 每一朵茉莉花都是一位純潔美麗的白雪公主。

sentences.english: Snow White runs, runs, and runs. Finally she runs into the woods.
sentences.chinese: 白雪公主跑啊跑的，最後逃進了森林裏。

sentences.english: Snow White and the Prince were married, and they lived happily ever after.
sentences.chinese: 但是幾年過後，白雪公主長得越來越漂亮。

sentences.english: But the Dwarfs seemed to be too late to help Snow White.
sentences.chinese: 但是小矮人已經來得太遲，不能及時救到白雪公主。

sentences.english: Snow white got lost in the woods and met seven dwarves . she went to live with them.
sentences.chinese: 白雪公主在森林中迷了路，遇到了七個小矮人。

definition: Winnie-the-Pooh (bear character in children's stories by A. A. Milne adapted by Disney)
